Rapidfire Games

A multiplayer .io-like game built using React and Socket.io. Allows for the creation and join of lobbies and includes 4 games.

Portfolio Optimizer

A tool for optimizing the money distribution within a portfolio. Built with Django and PyPortfolioOpt. Has graphs, charts, account creation. Sources data from TDAmeritrade API.
